data.title: Design Team
data.text:
Dr. Stuart Brown. Dr. Brown’s is trained in general and internal medicine, psychiatry, and clinical research. His years of clinical practice and thousands of detailed clinical reviews affirmed the importance and need for healthy play throughout the human life cycle, and his later evaluation of highly creative individuals revealed the centrality of playfulness to their success and well-being. Dr. Stuart Brown, Founder and President. www.nifplay.org

Marty's Bag Works, a family own company for over 40 years in Annapolis, Maryland. The company specialize in design custom corporate apparel from top brands. Their clients range from small to large corporations.

Marty's Bag Works has evolved into a significant player in the garment embellishment industry and is a leading privately-owned embroidery company in the U.S.

Marty's Bag Works is a husband and wife team, Lisa Wheeler -President and Bryan Nagel - General Manager.

www.martysbagworks.com

Glen Morris, AIA is the Entertainment market sector lead and Senior Project Manager for Huitt-Zollars in Southern California.

Glen is a Vice President with Huitt-Zollars and has served on the board of the Themed Entertainment Association for many years.

Recent entertainment project experience while at Huitt-Zollars includes Marvel Land at Disneyland Paris, Star Wars: Galaxy’s Edge at Disneyland, CA and Walt Disney World Resort, FL., Pandora The World of Avatar, Walt Disney World Resort, FL.

Prior to joining Huitt-Zollars, Glen lead design teams for Universal Studios Port Adventura, Spain, Universal Studios Jurassic Park: the Ride, Hollywood, CA, and Universal Studios Universal Citywalk.

Todd has been working all over the world for nearly 40 years on significant, notable and award-winning projects. He continues to be active in North, Central and South America, especially Brasil, the Caribbean, the Middle East, Europe and Asia creating memorable solutions that enhance and coexist with great authentic places.

Urban environment, mixed-use development, eco-tourism, or entertainment destination, TMLA brings expertise in the creation of great places and experiences for people. Successful placemaking strategies for projects demand a diversity of and synergy between multiple program uses in order to create environments in which to live, work, and play.

Unless otherwise noted, all work shown here was done by Todd McCurdy and his teams - while leading the LA practice at MorrisTerra, Morris Architects, MORRIS and / or HZ.
